css.editor: body{font-family:'Avenir Next';max-width:700px;margin:0 auto;padding:20px}.graphene{color:#545454}.graphene a{color:#de4751}.graphene blockquote{color:#333}.graphene hr{background-color:#dedede}.graphene .cell.inEditMode{border-color:#dedede}.graphene .text-cell table,.graphene .text-cell table th,.graphene .text-cell table td{border:1px solid #dedede!important}.graphene .text-cell{font-size:18px;line-height:1.6;font-family:'Avenir Next';background-color:#fbfbfb}.graphene .code-cell .editor,.graphene .markdown-cell .ace_editor,.graphene .latex-cell .editor{font-size:16px;line-height:1.6}.graphene .markdown-cell .ace_markup.ace_heading.ace_1,.graphene .markdown-cell .ace_markup.ace_heading.ace_2,.graphene .markdown-cell .ace_markup.ace_heading.ace_3,.graphene .markdown-cell .ace_markup.ace_heading.ace_4,.graphene .markdown-cell .ace_markup.ace_heading.ace_5,.graphene .markdown-cell .ace_markup.ace_heading.ace_6{color:#de4751!important}.graphene .markdown-cell .ace_heading,.graphene .markdown-cell .ace_string.ace_strong{color:#333!important;font-weight:bold}.graphene .markdown-cell .ace_line,.graphene .markdown-cell .ace_support.ace_function,.graphene .markdown-cell .ace_string.ace_emphasis,.graphene .markdown-cell .ace_list,.graphene .markdown-cell .ace_string.ace_blockquote,.graphene .markdown-cell .ace_constant.ace_language.ace_escape{color:#545454!important}.graphene #tag-field{margin:0}.graphene #tag-field .tag{background:#fbfbfb;border:none;color:#a0a0a0}.graphene #titlearea{border:none}
css.preview: body{font-family:'Avenir Next';max-width:700px;margin:0 auto;padding:20px}.graphene{color:#545454}.graphene a{color:#de4751}.graphene table{width:100%}.graphene table tr{background-color:#fbfbfb}.graphene table tr:nth-child(odd){background-color:#efefef}.graphene table th{background:#fbfbfb}.graphene table td,.graphene table th{border-color:#dedede}.graphene blockquote{color:#333;border-color:#de4751}.graphene hr{background-color:#dedede}.graphene code{font-size:16px;padding:3px 6px}.graphene .text-cell,.graphene .diagram-cell,.graphene .markdown-cell{font-size:18px;line-height:1.6;font-family:'Avenir Next'}.graphene .code-cell,.graphene .latex-cell{font-size:16px;line-height:1.6}.graphene .markdown-cell .ace_line{font-size:16px}.graphene #tag-field{margin:0}.graphene #tag-field .tag{background:#fbfbfb;border:none;color:#a0a0a0}.graphene #titlearea{border:none}.graphene *+h1,.graphene *+h2{margin-top:52px}.graphene *+h3,.graphene *+h4{margin-top:39px}.graphene *+h5,.graphene *+h6{margin-top:26px}
css.presentation: body{font-family:'Avenir Next';max-width:60%;margin:0 auto;padding:20px}.graphene{color:#545454}.graphene a{color:#de4751}.graphene table{width:100%}.graphene table tr{background-color:#fbfbfb}.graphene table tr:nth-child(odd){background-color:#efefef}.graphene table th{background:#fbfbfb}.graphene table td,.graphene table th{border-color:#dedede}.graphene blockquote{color:#333;border-color:#de4751}.graphene hr{background-color:#dedede}.graphene .text-cell,.graphene .markdown-cell{font-size:22px;line-height:1.6;font-family:'Avenir Next';background-color:#fbfbfb}.graphene .code-cell,.graphene .latex-cell{font-size:20px;line-height:1.6}.graphene *+h1,.graphene *+h2{margin-top:52px}.graphene *+h3,.graphene *+h4{margin-top:39px}.graphene *+h5,.graphene *+h6{margin-top:26px}
